We were met by Lita when we arrived and she was hospitable, kind and down to earth. The “loft feel” space was extremely clean, really cute and everything we needed!

The coffee that was provided was delicious and loading in and out was easy because the driveway pulls you up right outside the front door!
Truly, for sleepy road trippers who want a seamless overnight stay, you can’t go wrong staying here!
We’d love to stay here again when we travel through. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
